Organization based in.content:
Please analyze the given text to identify relationships where an organization is headquartered or primarily operates in a specific location. Look for patterns that indicate this type of relationship.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Organization', 'Location', 'Whether the Organization is based in the Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Prime Datuk Sri Dr. Mahathir said he discussed these matters with African National Congress , ANC , leader Nelson Mandela and President de Klerk during his brief visit to South Africa .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| African National Congress (ANC) | South Africa | Yes |
| Nelson Mandela | South Africa | No (he is a person, not an organization) |
| President de Klerk | South Africa | Yes (he was the President of South Africa at the time) |

Explanation:

* African National Congress (ANC) is a political party that is based in South Africa.
* Nelson Mandela is a person who was the leader of the ANC and later became the President of South Africa. He is not an organization.
* President de Klerk was the President of South Africa at the time of the discussion mentioned in the paragraph. He is also associated with South Africa.

Paragraph: Prime Datuk Sri Dr. Mahathir said he discussed these matters with African National Congress , ANC , leader Nelson Mandela and President de Klerk during his brief visit to South Africa .

| Person | Location | Whether the Person has lived in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Nelson Mandela | South Africa | Yes |
| President de Klerk | South Africa | Yes |

However, it does not explicitly state that Prime Datuk Sri Dr. Mahathir has lived in South Africa, as it only mentions his brief visit to the country.
